plugins.name: Colors from the HEX List
plugins.description:
Simple as it is. This plugin creates neatly organized color swatches in Figma from a list of HEX values.

You can paste plain HEX values for opaque colors or enable transparent mode to include alpha percentages. The plugin automatically groups, names, and sorts the swatches by hue and brightness — perfect for visualizing palettes or documenting tokens.


🔹 Grouped by hue and saturation

🔹 Transparent colors sorted by opacity

🔹 Auto-layout-ready and clean naming

🔹 Works with any HEX color list
plugins.tagline: Generate color swatches from HEX or HEX + alpha input

127207.name: Colors from the HEX List
127207.description:

🔹 Transparent colors sorted by opacity

🔹 Auto-layout-ready and clean naming

🔹 Works with any HEX color list
127207.tagline: Generate color swatches from HEX or HEX + alpha input

plugins.name: Protege AI
plugins.description:
Protege AI for Figma: Legal Compliance, Simplified

Contact founders@protegecounsel.ai to get a trial account.


In the dynamic realm of marketing, aligning content with legal standards is crucial yet challenging. Protege AI for Figma is crafted to empower in-house legal teams, offering a robust tool to review marketing materials quickly and effectively. This Figma plugin integrates flawlessly into your design workflow, using advanced AI to identify and highlight legal concerns in real time.


Key Features:


  1. Automated Content Analysis: Deploy state-of-the-art AI to scan designs for legal issues like copyright infringement, regulatory non-compliance, and sensitive language.
  2. Real-Time Feedback: Instantly receive suggestions and edits within Figma, enabling swift adjustments and compliance checks.
  3. Customizable Legal Libraries: Adjust the AI’s scanning abilities to match your specific legal standards and requirements, ensuring a tailored and relevant review.
  4. Collaborative Review Process:** Enhance cooperation between legal and marketing teams with in-document comments and edits, making the review and approval process smoother.
  5. Comprehensive Reporting:** Produce in-depth reports on the legal review process, including issues identified and resolutions, for compliance tracking and audit trails.


Benefits:


  1. Save Time and Resources: Significantly cut down on the time dedicated to reviewing marketing materials, freeing your legal team for more strategic tasks.
  2. Enhance Accuracy: Reduce the risk of missing legal issues with the AI’s detailed analysis.
  3. Improve Collaboration: Foster a more efficient and collaborative relationship between your legal and marketing departments.
  4. Ensure Compliance: Keep up with changes in regulations with an AI tool that adapts to new legal standards.


Ideal For:


  1. In-house legal teams aiming to enhance the review of marketing content directly within Figma.
  2. Marketing teams looking to accelerate compliance and mitigate legal risks in their creative.
  3. Legal professionals seeking to utilize technology for more efficient and integrated workflows.
plugins.tagline: Protege AI: Streamline Legal Reviews for Creative & Marketing

plugins.name: Bulk image exporter
plugins.description:
Speed up your workflow by exporting all images from your Figma page in just one click! This plugin collects every image and packs them into a handy ZIP file — no more exporting one by one.


You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:


  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


👉 Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Product and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

135102.name: Bulk image exporter
135102.description:
Speed up your workflow by exporting all images from your Figma page in just one click! This plugin collects every image and packs them into a handy ZIP file — no more exporting one by one.


You can also set a size limit (default: 1MB) to automatically compress images without losing too much quality. Perfect for quick exporting, sharing assets with devs and optimizing performance.


Features:


  1. Export all images on the current page in a ZIP file
  2. Set max size per image (e.g. 1MB or less)
  3. Check the current download status.
  4. Download each image individually


👉 Please note: this plugin is currently in beta, feedback is welcome!
135102.release_notes: Version 1.0.3 - Plugin now works even if you haven't selected a frame first.
135102.tagline: Export every image on your page in a single ZIP

plugins.name: Markly - Paste/Copy from Markdown
plugins.description:
Markly makes it effortless to bring Markdown into your Figma designs or export Figma text layers as Markdown. Paste or type Markdown to instantly create styled text layers, copy selected layers as clean Markdown, and map Markdown elements to your local text styles for brand consistency.


The plugin has three command launcher:

  1. Convert from Markdown: Paste or select Markdown text and generate Figma layers.
  2. Copy as Markdown: Export Figma text layers as ready-to-use Markdown.
  3. Match Styles: Map headings, lists, and links to your custom Figma text styles.


Includes live preview, dark/light theme support, and an intuitive manual copy UI for full clipboard compatibility.
plugins.tagline: Paste, copy, and map Markdown content to Figma text layers with style.

133585.name: Markly - Paste/Copy from Markdown
133585.description:
Markly makes it effortless to bring Markdown into your Figma designs or export Figma text layers as Markdown. Paste or type Markdown to instantly create styled text layers, copy selected layers as clean Markdown, and map Markdown elements to your local text styles for brand consistency.


The plugin has three command launcher:

  1. Convert from Markdown: Paste or select Markdown text and generate Figma layers.
  2. Copy as Markdown: Export Figma text layers as ready-to-use Markdown.
  3. Match Styles: Map headings, lists, and links to your custom Figma text styles.


Includes live preview, dark/light theme support, and an intuitive manual copy UI for full clipboard compatibility.
133585.tagline: Paste, copy, and map Markdown content to Figma text layers with style.

plugins.name: Check Contrast
plugins.description:
Color Contrast Checker: Enhance Visibility, Ensure Accessibility


Elevate your design standards with our Color Contrast Checker—a vital tool for creating visually accessible and user-friendly digital content.


How to use:

  1. Select any 2 colors or layers
  2. Check the contrast
  3. Make changes if required
  4. Apply the changes


Color Contrast Checker is more than just a tool; it's a commitment to inclusive design. By ensuring that your content is readable and accessible, you enhance the user experience for all individuals, including those with visual disabilities. Prioritize accessibility in your design process and make a positive impact on your audience with our easy-to-use and effective contrast evaluation tool.


--

Any feedback is welcome at datta.prianko@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Enhance Visibility, Ensure Accessibility

plugins.name: Change Text Field by ID
plugins.description:
A very simple plugin allowing you to set the text of a figma Text element by referencing it's internal node ID.

One way you can get the node ID of your text elements is by fetching your figma 'file' layout data via the figma file API end-point: https://api.figma.com/v1/files/${FIGMA_FILE_KEY}

Then look for your text element and identify it's corresponding ID field.

Else you could try using the 'Text node name to id' plugin.
plugins.tagline: Set the text of a Text element by referencing its node ID

97082.name: Change Text Field by ID
97082.description:
A very simple plugin allowing you to set the text of a figma Text element by referencing it's internal node ID.

One way you can get the node ID of your text elements is by fetching your figma 'file' layout data via the figma file API end-point: https://api.figma.com/v1/files/${FIGMA_FILE_KEY}

Then look for your text element and identify it's corresponding ID field.

Else you could try using the 'Text node name to id' plugin.
97082.tagline: Set the text of a Text element by referencing its node ID

plugins.name: Token Loader
plugins.description:
Generate a `tokens.json` using something like Style Dictionary.


example tokens.json:


[
{
"name": "core/color/black",
"value": "#000000"
},
{
"name": "alias/color/black",
"value": "#000000",
"aliasOf": "core/color/black"
}
]


Typescript types for the tokens:


interface VariableToken {
name: string; // an/example/name
value: unknown;
}

interface AliasToken extends VariableToken {
aliasOf: VariableToken['name'];
}

type Token = VariableToken | AliasToken;


Next, you can drop in that tokens.json on the plugin window to automatically generate tokens.


Note! It will drop unused ones from the collection, and update existing.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to load tokens (from StyleDictionary), and convert them in to Local Variables

98931.name: Token Loader
98931.description:

example tokens.json:


[
{

"value": "#000000"
},
{

"value": "#000000",
"aliasOf": "core/color/black"
}
]


Typescript types for the tokens:


interface VariableToken {
name: string; // an/example/name
value: unknown;
}

interface AliasToken extends VariableToken {
aliasOf: VariableToken['name'];
}

type Token = VariableToken | AliasToken;


Next, you can drop in that tokens.json on the plugin window to automatically generate tokens.


Note! It will drop unused ones from the collection, and update existing.
98931.tagline: A plugin to load tokens (from StyleDictionary), and convert them in to Local Variables

plugins.name: Batch rename variables
plugins.description:
Renaming variables at scale can be pretty tricky, or nearly impossible!


This plugin will allow you to do so by using either:

  1. Find and replace
  2. Add a prefix
  3. Add a suffix
  4. Change the casing for all


If you make a mistake, you can revert the change too.

accepted.name: Luis Ouriach
accepted.description:
Design & community @figmadesign. I write a newsletter, manage and host @8pxmag. 

Hot sauce on everything.

plugins.tagline: Find and replace, prefixes, suffixes, casing

plugins.name: Chameleon
plugins.description:
🦎 CHAMELEON


Chameleon is a Figma plugin that turns color token management into a breeze. Build smart palettes, structure tokens, and export directly into native Figma Variables.



🎨 KEY FEATURES


🎨 Smart palette generation — create harmonious color ramps from a single base color


🌒 Auto dark theme — instantly generate dark versions of your palettes


♿ A11Y mode — contrast-optimized palettes that meet WCAG accessibility standards


🧷 Figma Variables export — full support for collections, modes, and cross-collection aliases


📤 JSON import/export — compatible with Figma Variables and Token Studio


✏️ Flexible structure — rename shades, palettes, collections, and modes while preserving links



🌒 AUTO DARK THEME


Instantly generate perceptually balanced dark palettes based on your light theme.


How it works:

  1. Inverts brightness scale: lightest shade (50) becomes darkest, darkest (900) becomes lightest
  2. Base color remains at position 500
  3. Brightness follows a perceptual (non-linear) scale
  4. Saturation is increased for dark shades, reduced for light ones
  5. Additional correction ensures visual harmony



🎨 BASE MODE


Best for:

  1. Creating aesthetic palettes without strict contrast rules
  2. Branding and accent color systems
  3. Visually balanced UIs with emphasis on artistic control


Generation logic:

  1. Base color is placed at center (shade 500)
  2. Builds out lighter (50–400) and darker (600–900) shades
  3. Brightness and saturation adjust relative to the base



♿ A11Y MODE


Palettes generated with perceptual brightness, ensuring strong contrast between shades.


Best for:

  1. Interfaces requiring WCAG compliance
  2. Government, medical, educational and fintech products
  3. Inclusive design for wide audiences


Generation logic:

  1. Builds a scale of perceived brightness
  2. Base color is positioned where its brightness fits best
  3. Shades are calibrated for target contrast
  4. Contrast between neighbors ≥ 1.3:1



📌 HOW TO USE


  1. Create your base palettes in the "Global" tab (5 to 15 shades)
  2. Enable A11Y mode if needed
  3. Switch between light and dark themes to evaluate the result
  4. Export everything to Figma Variables or JSON
  5. Youtube



⚙️ UINDER YHE HOOD


  1. HSL-based ramp generation
  2. Edge brightness: Light — 95% → 20%, Dark — 15% → 85%
  3. Auto positioning of base color (especially in A11Y mode)
  4. Built-in WCAG contrast checker
  5. Visual base marker (★)
  6. Full support for Figma Variables & Token Studio structure



🚧 STATUS


This plugin is in beta. We welcome feedback and are actively improving it.
plugins.tagline: Color token generator with automatic shade scales and Figma Variables export

plugins.name: Just Notes
plugins.description:
✏️ Create & edit notes — Add contextual notes right next to your designs. Edit them anytime to keep your team in the loop.

🎨 Customize your categories — Tailor categories to fit your workflow: rename them, change colors, or add new ones.

📌 Smart object linking — Notes stay linked to the layers they were created for. If things move around, just sync and your notes will snap back into place.


How to use:

To add a note: select an object, fill in the form, click Add note.

To edit a note: click on it, make changes in the form, click Save.
plugins.tagline: Clear notes for seamless handoffs

130211.name: Just Notes
130211.description:
✏️ Create & edit notes — Add contextual notes right next to your designs. Edit them anytime to keep your team in the loop.

🎨 Customize your categories — Tailor categories to fit your workflow: rename them, change colors, or add new ones.

📌 Smart object linking — Notes stay linked to the layers they were created for. If things move around, just sync and your notes will snap back into place.


How to use:

To add a note: select an object, fill in the form, click Add note.

To edit a note: click on it, make changes in the form, click Save.

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

accepted.name: Muhammad Faizan Atiq
accepted.description: Hey there! I’m a design nerd with a big love for systems that turn ideas into magic. Every pixel counts, every pattern tells a story!

plugins.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

126526.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
126526.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!
126526.release_notes:
Release Notes v2.0.0

✨ New Features:
• Create sections with custom background colors
• Organize elements horizontally or vertically
• Adjust spacing and padding between elements
• Set maximum section width for better layout control

🛠️ Improvements:
• Sections are created exactly where you select elements
• Consistent spacing between rows in horizontal layout
• Smooth color picker with preset swatches
• Modern dark theme UI with glassmorphism effects

🐛 Fixed:
• Section positioning now matches native Figma behavior

plugins.name: KeyFinder
plugins.description:
KeyFinder simplifies the process of retrieving and copying Figma component keys.


Features


Flexible Scope Selection: Choose from three options:

  1. Current Selection: Displays keys and names for your selected components and component sets.
  2. Current Page: Retrieves all components and component sets on the active page.
  3. Entire File: Accesses components and component sets across your whole Figma file.

Component Set: Option to include or exclude component sets in your results.

One-Click Copy: Quickly copy the displayed component information to your clipboard for easy sharing.

Clear Visualisation: View component keys alongside their names for easy reference.

plugins.name: Component Crafter
plugins.description:
Quickly and easily create and manage your components


Features


1.Create Components or Component Sets

Convert any selected layers into components or component sets, with an option to replace them with their instances.


2.Add layers Directly to Existing Components


3.Replace with Component Instances

Swap selected layers with component instances for better design consistency.


4.Advanced Selection Options

Select layers by shared properties before converting them into components.


5.Clone as New Components


6.Instance Management

  1. Select instances on the current page.
  2. Detach instances on the page or across the file.


7.Detach Components

Break components into editable layers while preserving their appearance.


8.Decompose a Component


9.Multi-Language Support
plugins.tagline: Quickly and easily create and manage your components

plugins.name: Nong's Content Filler
plugins.description:
Usage:

  1. Fill Specific Content: Select the text that needs to be filled (single or multiple selections), click the type button, and the relevant content will be automatically filled.
  2. Custom Fill: Select the text that needs to be filled (single or multiple selections), enter custom content in the text box (one entry per line), and click the Apply button. The selected text will be automatically filled with the custom content.
  3. Chinese-English Translation: Select the text that needs to be filled (single selection), enter Chinese content in the text box, and click the Translate button. The translated English content will be automatically filled in the selected text.


使用方式：

  1. 填充特定内容：选择需要填充的文字（单个或多个），点击类型按钮，则自动填充相关内容。
  2. 自定义填充：选择需要填充的文字（单个或多个），在文本框内输入自定义内容（每行一个），点击Apply按钮，则自动填充成输入的自定义内容。
  3. 中英翻译：选择需要填充的文字（单个），在文本框内输入中文内容，点击Translate按钮，则翻译好的英文会自动填充到选择的文字上。
plugins.tagline: Quick Fill Content & Translate

  3. Chinese-English Translation: Select the text that needs to be filled (single selection), enter Chinese content in the text box, and click the Translate button. The translated English content will be automatically filled in the selected text.

plugins.name: Framenizer - Organize frames with ease
plugins.description:
Framenizer is a Figma plugin designed to help you organize and manage your frames with ease. Whether you are working on a design system or a simple prototype, it streamlines your workflow by automatically organizing your frames.


Key features

  1. Automatic frame arrangement: Quickly organize your frames in either horizontal or vertical layouts with just a few clicks.
  2. Consistent spacing: Maintain a clean and professional look with consistent spacing between all your frames.
  3. Section titles: Add descriptive titles to your frame groups for better organization and documentation.
  4. Section wrapping: Group related frames together by wrapping them in dedicated sections.
  5. Naming options: Choose between preserving your original frame names or using automatic naming conventions.
  6. Support and feedback: Constantly improving the plugin based on your input.


Need help or have suggestions?

I am always looking to improve the plugin. If you have any questions, encounter issues, or have ideas for new features, please don't hesitate to reach out to me at achmadalimin.com or Linkedin.
plugins.tagline: Help you organize and manage your frames with ease.

135342.name: Framenizer - Organize frames with ease
135342.description:
Framenizer is a Figma plugin designed to help you organize and manage your frames with ease. Whether you are working on a design system or a simple prototype, it streamlines your workflow by automatically organizing your frames.


Key features

  1. Automatic frame arrangement: Quickly organize your frames in either horizontal or vertical layouts with just a few clicks.
  2. Consistent spacing: Maintain a clean and professional look with consistent spacing between all your frames.
  3. Section titles: Add descriptive titles to your frame groups for better organization and documentation.
  4. Section wrapping: Group related frames together by wrapping them in dedicated sections.
  5. Naming options: Choose between preserving your original frame names or using automatic naming conventions.
  6. Support and feedback: Constantly improving the plugin based on your input.


Need help or have suggestions?

I am always looking to improve the plugin. If you have any questions, encounter issues, or have ideas for new features, please don't hesitate to reach out to me at achmadalimin.com or Linkedin.
135342.release_notes:

Direct color controls - Intuitive color picker with real-time preview
Smart color input - Support for hex codes and color names
Precision opacity control - Draggable controls with direct input

🚀 Improvements
Enhanced plugin branding - Better discoverability
Performance boost - Faster loading and smoother interactions
Fixed tooltip positioning - Consistent alignment across all controls

🐛 Bug Fixes
Resolved tooltip positioning issues during layout changes
Enhanced focus states for better accessibility

Upgrade now!
135342.tagline: Help you organize and manage your frames with ease.

plugins.name: Style X-Ray
plugins.description:
Style X-Ray is your UI detective inside Figma. Instantly inspect layout, spacing, typography, colors, shadows, and more — all translated into CSS-friendly properties.


Perfect for developers using Tailwind, vanilla CSS, or AI tools like Cursor. Just select a frame, extract the design anatomy, and paste the JSON into your code workflow.


🚀 Speed up dev handoff

🔍 Catch spacing & style issues early

🤖 Power up AI agents with real design data
plugins.tagline: Scan Figma designs. Expose the CSS beneath.

129669.description:

plugins.name: Custom Table Generator
plugins.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
plugins.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.

plugins.name: 语言文本替换工具
plugins.description:
使用流程


快速将设计稿中的文本替换为目标语言，只需以下几步：


1. 选中设计元素或画板 在Figma中，选中需要替换文本的设计元素或整个画板（提示：确保选中的元素包含需要替换的文本图层）

2. 打开插件 在Figma顶部菜单栏中，点击“插件” > 搜索并打开“多国语言文本替换”（或通过快捷方式运行）

3. 上传翻译文档 在插件界面中，点击“上传文件”按钮，选择你的 .xlsx 翻译文档。 注意：翻译文档需按照以下规范准备：

* 文档必须包含两列：第一列为源文本，第二列为目标文本。

* 默认列名：A1 为“源文本”（如“英语”），B1 为“目标文本”（如“阿拉伯语”）。

4. 输入源文本与目标文本列名 在插件界面的输入框中，输入或确认翻译文档中的源文本列名（例如“英语”）和目标文本列名（例如“阿拉伯语”）。

5. 点击“开始替换” 确认无误后，点击插件界面上的“开始替换”按钮。 插件会自动扫描选中的设计元素，匹配源文本并替换为目标文本，同时保持原始布局不变。

6. 查看替换结果
plugins.tagline: 语言文本替换工具

5. 点击“开始替换” 确认无误后，点击插件界面上的“开始替换”按钮。 插件会自动扫描选中的设计元素，匹配源文本并替换为目标文本，同时保持原始布局不变。

6. 查看替换结果

plugins.name: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc
plugins.description: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc streamlines the process of integrating custom SVG's visuals into Power BI. Instead of manually recreating designs, simply export your Figma frame as an SVG, paste it into a Power BI measure, and tweak the code to incorporate dynamic elements like measures and variables. This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly export Figma frames to Power BI as editable SVGs for dynamic, custom visuals.

plugins.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
plugins.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It’s perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you’re working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
plugins.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision — organize your designs by the spectrum

115283.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
115283.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It’s perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you’re working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
115283.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision — organize your designs by the spectrum

plugins.name: Conversor de REM a PX
plugins.description:
Simplifica la conversión entre REM y PX con esta herramienta práctica y eficiente. Este plugin es ideal para diseñadores y desarrolladores que trabajan con unidades relativas y absolutas, permitiéndote calcular valores de forma rápida y precisa.


Características Principales

✅ Conversión bidireccional: Convierte fácilmente entre PX y REM, y viceversa.

🎯 Configuración de tamaño base: Personaliza el tamaño base de fuente (default 16px) para adaptarlo a tus proyectos.

💡 Resultados instantáneos: Obtén los resultados con solo un clic.

📋 Copia fácil al portapapeles: Copia los valores resultantes directamente con un botón.

⚡ Interfaz amigable: Diseño limpio e intuitivo que facilita el flujo de trabajo.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Define el tamaño base de la fuente: Ingresa el tamaño base (por ejemplo, 16px).
  2. Ingresa el valor a convertir: Escribe el número en PX o REM.
  3. Selecciona el tipo de conversión: Elige entre PX a REM o REM a PX.
  4. Presiona "CONVERTIR": Obtén el resultado al instante y cópialo si lo necesitas.


🚀 Feedback Bienvenido

Este conversor es un MVP pensado para facilitar tu trabajo diario. ¿Qué más te gustaría incluir? ¡Déjame tus sugerencias y ayuda a que esta herramienta sea aún más útil!
plugins.tagline: Convierte fácil entre px y rem para un diseño más preciso y consistente.

plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you’re ready to streamline your design process!

accepted.name: Marta IB
accepted.description:
Hola! I am passionate UX designer, who specializes in crafting user experiences that are accessible, thoughtful, and truly enjoyable.
https://martaib.com/

plugins.tagline: Enhance your design flow with Component Viewer—highlight and manage your Figma components easily!

plugins.name: BatchGen
plugins.description:
BatchGen: Effortlessly Populate Your Figma Designs with Realistic Content


BatchGen is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers quickly generate and update content in bulk. Whether it’s names, numbers, addresses, emails, company names, or ratings, BatchGen brings dynamic, customizable data directly into your Figma projects, saving you time and streamlining your workflow.


Key Features:


•Batch Update: Select multiple text layers or search within groups to quickly batch update content.

•Random Numbers: Generate random numbers with optional prefixes to create custom combinations.

•Random Names: Create realistic names (first, last, or full) with options for prefixes and gender.

•Random Dates: Generate dates within a specified range in your preferred format.


Pro Features:


Unlock premium content generation for even more customization:


•Addresses: Generate complete addresses, including postal codes, cities, and countries.

•Emails: Create random email addresses with customizable formats and domains.

•Numbers: Define ranges, formats, and prefixes for random number generation.

•Company Names: Generate unique company names based on industry and location preferences.

•Monetary Values: Create realistic currency values with customizable ranges and currencies.

•Ratings & Scores: Generate ratings in stars, percentages, or decimals with customizable ranges.


BatchGen is the perfect tool for designers who want to enhance their workflow and bring designs to life with ease.
plugins.tagline: Ultimate Content Generation Tool for Figma

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin authenticates users via post request

117757.release_notes:
BatchGen Release Notes – [Version 2.1]

Release Date: 31/1/2025

🚀 Improvements
•      Security Enhancements: Strengthened data handling and storage to ensure better protection of sensitive information.
•Performance Optimisations: Faster generation of content, reducing processing time and improving overall efficiency.

🛠 Bug Fixes
•Resolved an issue where certain random generation fields were not updating correctly.
•Fixed UI glitches that occasionally caused misalignment in generated content.
•Improved stability when handling large-scale batch operations.
117757.tagline: Ultimate Content Generation Tool for Figma

plugins.name: Half Pixel Hunter
plugins.description: Simple plugin to track and eliminate half-pixels in your designs, ensuring pixel-perfect layouts. It scans shapes, position, and layers to find non-integer values
plugins.tagline: Scan to find nodes with non-integer values. This means you can easily find half-pixels.

99560.name: Half Pixel Hunter
99560.description: Simple plugin to track and eliminate half-pixels in your designs, ensuring pixel-perfect layouts. It scans shapes, position, and layers to find non-integer values
99560.tagline: Scan to find nodes with non-integer values. This means you can easily find half-pixels.
